sentence: Figure 1 reports our systematic search strategy flow diagram in accordance with PRISMA guidelines [53].
Figure 2 describes these articles by data source and publication year.
Figure 3 describes the extent to which survey studies (n = 1594) used expert and/or consumer-defined approaches to estimate population need for substance use services, over time.
Figure 4 illustrates how expert-defined need has been conceptualized in the literature on population need for substance use services.
Figure 5 illustrates the variety of ways consumer-defined need for care was assessed.
